sentences.sContent: The myrtle, dove, sparrow, and swan are sacred to her.
sentences.sContent_eng: The myrtle, dove, sparrow, and swan are sacred to her.
sentences.sCn: 桃金娘，鸽子，麻雀和天鹅是她的圣物。

sentences.sContent: Appearing in great danger, the tiny sparrow tumbled on to the lawn, but softy Flint appeared to have taken pity on him.
sentences.sContent_eng: Appearing in great danger, the tiny sparrow tumbled on to the lawn, but softy Flint appeared to have taken pity on him.
sentences.sCn: 跌落在草地上的小麻雀看起来处于非常危险的境地，但是温柔的“弗林特”似乎非常同情他。

trans.tranOther: a small brown bird, very common in many parts of the world
